SummaryEnglish: Unidentified monsters suddenly appear. In a surrealistic world view, "scary and cute" pet monsters appear one after another and rampage in all directions. They look like toys, and they all look and act unexpectedly. Does humanity have a future or not?

1.SummaryEnglish: 東京に突如出現した怪獣、ゼロゼロイチ・愛玩剣（アイガンケン）は目につく物を手当たり次第に破壊をはじめた。人類は為す術もなくただ逃げ惑うしかない。彼らの正体は一体何なのか？
